name: Category wise Depreciation
query:
SELECT 
    ac.name AS category,
    COALESCE(SUM(ds.depreciation_amount), 0) AS depreciation
FROM `tabAsset Category` ac
LEFT JOIN `tabAsset` a ON ac.name = a.asset_category
LEFT JOIN `tabAsset Depreciation Schedule` ads ON a.name = ads.asset AND ads.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabDepreciation Schedule` ds ON ads.name = ds.parent AND ds.journal_entry IS NOT NULL
LEFT JOIN `tabAsset Finance Book` afb ON a.name = afb.parent
WHERE  a.company = %(company)s
	AND a.location = %(location)s
GROUP BY ac.name
ORDER BY ac.name;
